title: Check Customs Clearance Status
description: An import specialist needs to check if an international shipment has been cleared by customs.

tasks.description: Retrieve the shipment record using the container number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct import shipment.

tasks.description: Query the customs broker's system via an API for the latest clearance status.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system returns a status of 'Released by Customs'.

tasks.description: Update the shipment record with the clearance status, which triggers an alert to the transportation team that the container can now be picked up from the port.
tasks.expected_outcome: The shipment is updated, and the next team in the process is notified.
